text: Martin Lee Chu-ming, SC, JP (born 8 June 1938) is a Hong Kong politician and lawyer. He is the founding chairman of the United Democrats of Hong Kong and the Democratic Party. He was also a member of the Legislative Council of Hong Kong from 1985 to 1997 and from 1998 to 2008. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:Living people Category:Hong Kong politicians Category:Lawyers
title: Martin Lee
